text: A Django app that I am working has an Event model.
An Event may have associated photos, static html files and pdf files.
I would like to allow trusted users to upload these files, but I am wary about security, especially having read the following in the Django docs (link).
How can I validate the different types of files?
I would be interested to hear anyone's experience of dealing with this kind of thing, or links for further reading.
I have a gut feeling that html files may be too risky, in which case I'll restrict upload permissions to the administrator.
